net.metro.systemobjects

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.metro.systemobjects.Service

  • public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that provides information about a particular path of a route during a specific time of day and time of the week. It also contains a series of ServiceStop objects that contain rider data for each stop on this particular service during its scheduled time period.
    Author:
    Sean Harger

    • Constructor Detail

      • Service

        public Service(int svcId,
       Period pd,
       Stop ognStop,
       Stop dstStop,
       RoutePath pth)
        Constructs a Service.
        Parameters:
        svcId - unique id representing this Service
        pd - period during which this service operates
        ognStop - the origin Stop of this service (must be a stop from the RoutePath which owns this Service.
        dstStop - the destination Stop of this service (must be a stop from the RoutePath which owns this Service.
        pth - RoutePath which operates this service

      • getServicePath

        public java.util.ArrayList<WayPoint> getServicePath()
        Returns the portion of the parent route path on which this service operates. This includes all Stops and WayPoints in between the origin stop and destination stop.
        Returns:
        the portion of the parent route path on which this service operates.

      • findMinData

        public static int findMinData(DataType dType,
              java.util.ArrayList<Service> svcScope)
        Finds the minimum data value of the specified DataType within the specified list of services.
        Parameters:
        dType - data type to compare
        svcScope - services to search through
        Returns:
        the minimum data value across the specified services, or Integer.MAX_VALUE if none was found.

      • findMaxData

        Parameters:

        svcScope - services to search through
        Returns:
